text: I made the mushroom risotto again last night and it is seriously the best thing I’ve ever cooked. It tastes like professional fancy-ass restaurant level
I recently tried popcorn and it was perfect
oh yeah i’ve been meaning to try that risotto. maybe i’ll do that tonight
I brought the risotto in so that I can show it off to my mom when I head home tonight so if anybody wants to try a sample, you totally can! It’s delicious! (and vegetarian!)
